citations.narrative:
The facility has not followed vaccination protocol outlined in the program of veterinary care. The facility has not
administered the rabies vaccine to six shetland sheep dogs (microchip numbers 7306, 1472, 8069, 8072, 7145, 0852) in
accordance with the approved vaccination schedule. Failure to provide vaccinations on a schedule approved by the
attending veterinarian leads to an increased risk of contagious and/or deadly diseases in the dogs. Correct by ensuring
that vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending
veterinarian are implemented.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 05-October-2024 or the applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not followed vaccination protocol outlined in the program of veterinary care. The facility has not 
administered the rabies vaccine to six shetland sheep dogs (microchip numbers 7306, 1472, 8069, 8072, 7145, 0852) in 
accordance with the approved vaccination schedule. Failure to provide vaccinations on a schedule approved by the 
attending veterinarian leads to an increased risk of contagious and/or deadly diseases in the dogs. Correct by ensuring 
that vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending 
veterinarian are implemented. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 05-October-2024 or the applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
